log.py¶

class log.Logger¶

Handles the logs of a tello session.

starting_time¶

The starting datetime of the session

start_stamp¶

Starting timestamp

command_sent¶

A list tuple containing the body and the time of the command sent to tello

command_tuples¶

A list of cmdPoint tuples

battery¶

The battery level of tello

status¶

The status of tello

get_pathing_commands()¶

Forms a list of the grouped pathing commands.

Pathing commands have the following format: {direction} {value} Same commands are grouped, that means that they are represented as {direction} {sum_value}.

Returns

The grouped command strings.

Return type

List of strings

received(response)¶

Handles tello’s response.

If it is not an error response, updates the command_tuples list, the status and the battery level.

Parameters

response (string) – The body of the response

Returns

True if execution was successful, False if response was “Error” or a command was not sent

Return type

bool

reset()¶

Sets the command_sent attribute to an empty tuple.

reverse_path_cmd()¶

Iterates through the grouped pathing commands and returns their reveresed.

The reverse of a command is defined by the reverse_cmd_map dictionary.

Returns

The reversed pathing commands

Return type

List of strings

to_text(txt_name)¶

Generates a txt file with the commands of the current session.

Parameters

txt_name (string) – The name of the generated file

update_status(cmd)¶

Updates the status according to the executed command.

Parameters

cmd (string) – The body of the command executed

Tello
